ags:resource.dc:title: Model of strategic management of food industry enterprise business reputation

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The paper shows that the use of total cost management concept is not only able to underprop a high business reputation of the food industry enterprise, but also to ensure the directed economic development. Ad hoc, a model of strategic management of food industry enterprise business reputation is proposed, characterized by logically relevant co-relation of leading economic indicators. It is deduced that applying the concept of total cost management not only provides for business development, but also contributes to its positive business reputation.
